item.title: Overview
item.description: Built with .NET 6.0 and the goodness of MudBlazor Component Library. Incorporates the most essential Packages your projects will ever need. Follows Clean Architecture Principles. About # Documentation coming soon Development Enviroment # Make sure you have the API Running. Here is FSH Backend - https://github.com/fullstackhero/dotnet-webapi-boilerplate Once the API is up and running, this Blazor Project would consume it’s services.
